00020 #ifndef MOUNTLIST_H_
00021 # define MOUNTLIST_H_
00022 
00023 # include <stdbool.h>
00024 # include <sys/types.h>
00025 
00026 /* A mount table entry. */
00027 struct mount_entry
00028 {
00029   char *me_devname;             /* Device node name, including "/dev/". */
00030   char *me_mountdir;            /* Mount point directory name. */
00031   char *me_type;                /* "nfs", "4.2", etc. */
00032   dev_t me_dev;                 /* Device number of me_mountdir. */
00033   unsigned int me_dummy : 1;    /* Nonzero for dummy file systems. */
00034   unsigned int me_remote : 1;   /* Nonzero for remote fileystems. */
00035   unsigned int me_type_malloced : 1; /* Nonzero if me_type was malloced. */
00036   struct mount_entry *me_next;
00037 };
00038 
00039 struct mount_entry *read_file_system_list (bool need_fs_type);
00040 
00041 #endif
